name: IBM Cloud Private minimal installation on Microsoft Azure
description: This template will deploy ICP with a minimal amount of Virtual Machines and a minimal amount of services enabled.

metadata.displayName: IBM Cloud Private minimal installation on Microsoft Azure
metadata.longDescription: This template will deploy ICP with a minimal amount of Virtual Machines and a minimal amount of services enabled

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
Minimal Node Virtual Machine (1 or more VMs, no boot node deployed)
Virtual Machine 1 : IBM Cloud Private Master Node
Virtual Machine 2 : IBM Cloud Private Proxy Node(optional, if set to 0, master vm becomes proxy node)
Virtual Machine 3 or 3/4/5 : IBM Cloud Private Worker Nodes (optional, if set to 0, master vm becomes worker node)

Virtual Machine 6 : IBM Cloud Private Management Nodes (optional, if set to 0, master vm becomes management node)

bullets.title: Default Virtual Machine Settings
bullets.description: Defaults are shown and can be changed on deploy. They differ depending on the vm role.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM Cloud Private - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSBS6K/product_welcome_cloud_private.html
3. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
